My Games

Pokemon Violet

One of the latest Pokémon RPGs set in the open-world Paldea region.

Year: 2022

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Super Mario 3D All Stars

A collection of 3 classic 3D Mario games: Super Mario 64, Sunshine, and Galaxy.

Year: 2020

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Luigi's Mansion 3

Luigi explores a haunted hotel, using his trusty Poltergust to solve puzzles and catch ghosts.

Year: 2019

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove

A retro-inspired platformer with pixel art, treasure hunting, and epic boss battles.

Year: 2017

Publisher: Yacht Club Games

Console: Switch

Pokemon Let's Go Pikachu

A remake of Pokémon Yellow featuring Pikachu, with mechanics inspired by Pokémon GO.

Year: 2018

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom

A direct sequel to Breath of the Wild, with new powers, locations, and epic battles.

Year: 2023

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Splatoon 2

A colorful team-based shooter where players use ink to claim territory and defeat enemies.

Year: 2017

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Pokemon Shield

A role-playing adventure set in the Galar region, featuring new Pokémon and exciting battles.

Year: 2019

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch
